org.lockss.plnmonitor.dao

Class PLNDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lockss.plnmonitor.dao.PLNDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PLNDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class PLNDAO. Main Data Access Object updating values of all other LOCKSS objects by making queries to the database
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
